context.p: An error has occurred when trying to use the service because defined restrictions have been violated:

ul.li: The maximum number of concurrent users of the subscription has been reached. For example, 5 users are allowed to use the service concurrently, all of them are currently logged in, and you have tried to login to the service as the 6th user.
The subscription has been terminated. It is no longer available, thus you can no longer access the service.
